name: DrillDownPanel
description: Slide-out panel for drilling down into deal details with filtering and sorting

properties.name: drillDownData
properties.description: Object containing title, deals array, type, and metadata

properties.name: stageColors
properties.description: Object mapping stage names to colors

properties.name: onOpenDeal
properties.description: Callback to open a deal in external app

events.name: onPanelClose
events.description: Fired when the panel is closed

events.name: onDealOpen
events.description: Fired when a deal open action is triggered

functionalRequirements:
- Slide in from right side at top: 75px
- Display title and deal count/value summary
- Allow filtering deals by text search
- Support sorting by Amount, CloseDate, Probability
- Toggle between card and list views
- Include close button in header
- Use appropriate background color based on drill-down type
technicalDesign: Fixed position panel with CSS transitions. Contains local state for filter text, sort order, and display mode. Reuses DealCards and DealList components for display. Header color determined by drillDownData type/metadata.
